title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: In Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), when opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars appear to be enabled and movable. However, they have no effect on the image. When opening a small image, such as an icon, the scrollbars are misleading as they do not serve any purpose.
SR:
1. Launch Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Observe the scrollbars and their behavior when opening different image types, including small icons.
